title: A General Lack of Understanding
description: A collage series responding to the uncertainty and anxiety of our ever changing, ever disappearing reality.
actionLabel: View A General Lack of Understanding

title: Apprentice
description: A roguelike adventure game where you are thrust into a labyrinthine citadel to seek out that which your master desires. Certain death awaits.

title: Theme and Variation
description: A series of gifs procedurally generated from other, related gifs in a never ending, never repeating manner. If you have sensitivity to flashing light, this should be avoided.
